thread.section_title: PlushBeds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlushBeds.com | plushbeds.com
thread.title: Jose

author: Jose
title: Jose
text: I bought the botanical bliss mattress 3 years ago. Unfortunately, the top layer sagged a bit in the past few months. Plushbeds response (in specific Jolene from customer service) was outstanding. They replace my topper right away for the exact same one. Have piece of mind that you are not just buying a great bed but also have piece of mind that is backed by an excellent customer service. Thanks!
